title: Relationship-Centered Nursing Education for the Elderly: Competency Enhancement Through Blended Learning (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice scenario-based education with digital resource support

learning_goals: Perform nursing communication techniques for building empathetic relationships with the elderly with ≥80% proficiency.
Develop personalized nursing care plans after assessing individual needs of elderly patients.

Learners analyze provided digital learning materials (3 videos, 2 case studies) to clearly identify two core principles of relationship-centered nursing theory (empathic communication, trust-building), then design and submit a 1-page A4 scenario improving patient-nurse relationships by applying these principles. The scenario must achieve an "excellent" rating in four or more of the five evaluation rubric criteria (clarity, applicability, creativity, practicality, logical coherence).
Resolve ≥3 types of conflict scenarios in elderly care settings through team-based role-playing.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
